DOC.brief_title: Effect Intravenous Hyoscine Butylbromide Injection First Stage Labour Primigavidae
DOC.detailed_description: A case control study conduct 120 woman come Cairo University Maternity Hospital .Patients meet inclusion criterion ask participate study verbal consent obtain patient . Patients divide three equal group ( A , B , C ) . A single dose drug ( placebo HBB 20mg HBB 40 mg ) inject intravenously slowly group A , B , C respectively . Labouring mother monitor bed . Vaginal examination conduct every two hour . The duration first stage calculated time cervical dilatation three four centimeter active labour fully dilate cervix observe
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : 18 35 year old 2 . Primigravdae . 3 . Gestational age complete 37 41 week + 6 day . 4 . Uncomplicated cephalic singleton pregnancy occiptoanterior position . 5 . Established spontaneous active labour ( define presence least three regular uterine contraction 10 minute cervical dilatation three four centimeter ) cervical effacement le 50 % . 6 . Intact amniotic membrane . 1 . Multigravidae . 2 . Multiple fetus . 3 . Malpresentation . 4 . Patients indication elective caesarean section . 5 . Medical condition associate pregnancy e.g . preeclampsia , diabetes mellitus . 6 . Contraindications hyoscine butylbromide include know allergy hyoscine atropinics ( e.g. , atropine , scopolamine ) , myasthenia gravis , megacolon glaucoma . 7 . Patients presented causality spontaneous rupture membrane . 8 . Spontaneous rupture membrane active phase first stage labour . 9 . Oxytocin induction augmentation . 10 .
